title: Sherlock Holmes: The Enigmatic Files
description: Among the original Sherlock Holmes stories created by Arthur Conan Doyle we can find many enigmatic cases full of mysteries and secrets. This is a selection of the following The Case of Charles Augustus Milverton, The Six Napoleons, The Three Students, The Golden Pince-Nez, The Missing Three-Quarter, The Case of the Abbey Grange, and The Second Stain. Presented in an official edition without changes, introductions, footnotes, or any other interruption of the original stories written by Arthur Conan Doyle.
author: Arthur Conan Doyle
